title: Ornn Item Bug.
body:
So recently i was plying  game and i could buy ornn items, even though there wasnt an ornn on our team.
the screenshot i took corrupted somehow. i was playing {{champion:141}}  and went Rhaast, then those items just appeared in the shop.
Our team was losing real hard so i didnt get to try to buy one but please look into it. It might be fun but if i was on the receiving end of this it wont be very fun.
this is the game.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/187184345/200816960

i asked my teammates but they said none of them had those items.

replies.body: No you weren't, you aren't Kayn. You're a Master Yi
